subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gavin Floyd lost a no-hit bid when Édgar Rentería singled with one out in the eighth inning on Saturday as the Chicago White Sox rolled past the visiting Detroit Tigers, 7-0.
snippet: Gavin Floyd lost a no-hit bid when Édgar Rentería singled with one out in the eighth inning on Saturday as the Chicago White Sox rolled past the visiting Detroit Tigers, 7-0.
